entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
